means: Assessment of Information Systems and Technologies (in medicine) 信息系统和技术估价（医药）
Automated System Security Incident Support Team 自动化系统保密

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"帮助"之意。
means: aid ：正式用词，指帮助他人脱离危险或战胜困难，着重强者对急需帮助的弱者的帮助。
assist ：强调在提供帮助时，以受助者为主，所给的帮助起第二位或从属的作用。
help ：最普通用词，含义广泛。指一般性的或迫切需要的帮助，侧重积极地为他人提供物质、精神或其他方面的帮助。

sentence.Network_en: We are here to protect and assist the weak and infirm.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们来这里保护、帮助年迈体弱者。

sentence.Network_en: The public is urgently requested to assist police in tracing this man.
sentence.Network_cn: 紧急要求公众帮助警方追踪此人。

sentence.Network_en: The Authority will provide a welfare worker to assist you.
sentence.Network_cn: 当局会派一名义工来帮助你。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中佑字的解释 ... (2) 同本义[ bless] (4) 辅助;帮助[ assist] ◎ 佑 yòu.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... assignment 分配；指定 assist 援助；搀扶 association 联合；联盟；联想.
字典中旁字的解释 ... (3) 附近[ nearby] (1) 辅助,辅佐[ assist] (2) 依傍;依附[ depend on].
2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... assignment n. 任务 assist v. 帮助，协助 assistance n. 帮助，援助， 支持.

list.abs: 人教版七年级下册英语单词表 ... shop 商店 assistant 助理 shop assistant 店员.
七年级英语单词表 ... shop 商店;店铺 assistant 助手;助理 shop assistant 店员.
assembly ①装置，部件 ②集合，装配assistance ①辅助 ②辅助设备association ①联合，缔合 ②协会
如何入读新加坡公办高校 - 新加坡留学 -... ... 最新资讯 latest information 留学指导 Assistances 咨询问答 Counseling.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French assister, from Latin assistere 'take one's stand by', from ad- 'to, at' + sistere 'take one's stand'

entry.def: If you assist someone, you help them to do a job or task by doing part of the work for them.

example.ex: Julia was assisting him to prepare his speech...
example.tran: 朱莉娅正在帮他准备讲演稿。

example.ex: The family decided to assist me with my chores...
example.tran: 全家人决定帮助我做家务。

entry.tran: （提供信息、意见或金钱）帮助，援助
entry.def: If you assist someone, you give them information, advice, or money.

example.ex: The public is urgently requested to assist police in tracing this man...
example.tran: 紧急要求公众帮助警方追踪此人。

example.ex: Foreign Office officials assisted with transport and finance problems...
example.tran: 外交部官员帮助解决运输和经费问题。

entry.def: If something assists in doing a task, it makes the task easier to do.

example.ex: ...a chemical that assists in the manufacture of proteins...
example.tran: 有助于生成蛋白质的一种化学物质

example.ex: Here are some good sources of information to assist you in making the best selection...
example.tran: 这里是一些有价值的信息来源，可以帮助你作出最佳选择。

means.word_mean: 1. the activity of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose;

sentences.sentence: "he gave me an assist with the housework"

means.word_mean: 2. (sports) the act of enabling another player to make a good play
1. give help or assistance; be of service;

sentences.sentence: "Can you help me carry this table?"

means.word_mean: 2. act as an assistant in a subordinate or supportive function
3. work for or be a servant to;

sentences.sentence: "She attends the old lady in the wheelchair"
"Can you wait on our table, please?"
"The minister served the King for many years"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
persist[v.坚持]+ent表形容词→adj.固执的,坚持的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ent表形容词→adj.抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ible可..的→adj.可抵抗的
assist[v.帮助]+ant人→n.助手,助教;辅助物
consist[v.[in]在于,存在于;[of]由…组成,由…构成]+ence表名词→n.坚固性,浓度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
stems_affixes.word_buile: exist[v.存在;生存;生活]+ence表名词→n.存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
insist[v.[on]坚持要求,坚决主张,坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持,强求
persist[v.坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持, 持续
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ance表名词→n.[to]抵抗,反抗;抵抗力,阻力;电阻
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ence表名词→n.抵抗力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生存, 生活, 留存
stems_affixes.word_buile: subsist[v.生存,存在,供养]+ence表名词→n.生存, 生活, 留存
as加强动作+sist站→站过来→帮助
con共同+sist站立→站到一起→帮助
de加强+sist站立→站着不动→停止
sub下面+sist站立→站下去,活下去

Sentence.sentence: Engineers, scientists and agriculturalists have the knowledge, tools and systems that will assist in achieving productivity increases.

From self-service checkout lines at supermarket to industrial robots armed with saws and taught to carve up animal bodies in slaughter-houses, these ever-more-intelligent machines are now not just assisting workers but actually kicking them out of their jobs.

sentences.en: to assist in compiling a dictionary

jushi.english: When all assist, the job can be done quickly.
jushi.chinese: 如果大家都帮忙,这项工作很快就能完成。

jushi.english: I am willing to assist whenever there is an opportunity.
The driver assisted the old man out of a car.
jushi.chinese: 司机帮助那位老人下车。
